content: We have a few accounts for sale that we no longer need and are no longer/never used. These are personal or business accounts verified by us using our data. These are not hacked, cracked or stolen accounts nor accounts made using questionable documents and we don`t provide hacked or cracked account services. Accounts available:Bitpay: $150Coinbase Commerce: $200Kracken Verified: $100K/$500K Monthly bank transfer limit. $500K/day Crypto Withdrawal limit.CashApp Personal Account Identity Verified: $100Cashapp Business BTC Withdrawal enabled: $200Payoneer USA Business Account Fully Verified + withdrawal business bank account: Contact for priceCircle: Crypto payments gateway ($150)ZilBank Business Bank: USA bank account that features free VBA sub accounts and VCC Great for Paypal/Ebay/Etsy verification ($200) Winden Business bank: Bank account + docs + EIN Create unlimited VCC $150. Without docs $80 Acorns Bank and Investment account: Personal document verified ($200)Privacy.com/Lithic Corporate Account: Fully verified business and personal documents API access, Issue unlimited VCC cards. 250 cards per month for free and $0.10 per card beyond 250 ($400)We do not create these accounts for re-sale so we don`t take custom orders nor can we provide more accounts then you see available here. If you are interested please leave your Telegram handle here or contact me via Telegram at: Telegram: https://t.me/g1gltd@g1gltd
